thread.title: Brian Hoyer gets starting QB job back for scuffling Texans
thread.title_full: Brian Hoyer gets starting QB job back for scuffling Texans

author: KRISTIE RIEKEN
title: Brian Hoyer gets starting QB job back for scuffling Texans
text:
Eric Christian Smith Brian Hoyer gets starting QB job back for scuffling Texans 
Houston Texans' Brian Hoyer (7) and Jaelen Strong (11) celebrates after they connected on a touchdown pass against the Indianapolis Colts during the second half of an NFL football game Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, in Houston. (AP Photo/Eric Christian Smith) George Bridges Brian Hoyer gets starting QB job back for scuffling Texans 
Houston Texans' Ryan Mallett (15) throws against the Indianapolis Colts during the first half of an NFL football game Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, in Houston. (AP Photo/George Bridges) Posted: Friday, October 9, 2015 1:45 pm | Updated: 4:01 pm, Fri Oct 9, 2015. Brian Hoyer gets starting QB job back for scuffling Texans Associated Press | 
HOUSTON (AP) — Brian Hoyer has his job back as Houston's starting quarterback. 
Hoyer won the job out of camp but was pulled in the fourth quarter of a season-opening loss to the Chiefs after committing two turnovers. Ryan Mallett has started since then, but he has struggled and Hoyer took over in both of the last two games as the Texans fell to 1-4.
